entities.description: The time frame of the past 2 weeks, including today's date.
The duration of the most severe and frequent mood during the past 2 weeks.
The strength of bad feelings experienced during the past 2 weeks.
The frequency of bad feelings so severe that nothing could cheer up the respondent during the past 2 weeks.
The frequency of moods being so severe that they prevented the respondent from carrying out daily activities during the past 2 weeks.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 2 weeks.
Indicates the duration of the most severe and frequent mood experienced by the respondent.
Indicates the strength of the bad feelings experienced by the respondent during the past 2 weeks.
Indicates the impact of bad feelings so severe that nothing could cheer up the respondent.
Indicates the impact of mood severity on the respondent's ability to carry out daily activities.
